item.title: This Is the Work of the Lord
item.description:
This Is the Work of the Lord by Elder Waldo P. Call, Of the First Quorum of the Seventy given in Sunday Afternoon of 155th Annual General Conference on Sun Mar 31 1985
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder Waldo P. Call, Of the First Quorum of the Seventy

item.title: Follow the Prophets
item.description:
Follow the Prophets by Elder Waldo P. Call, Of the Seventy given in Sunday Afternoon of 160th Semiannual General Conference on Sun Sep 30 1990
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
